author: Brian Schwartz
title: Celebrity-backed criminal justice reform group donates 100,000 masks to prisons in wake of coronavirus
description: A celebrity-backed criminal justice reform group is donating 100,000 masks to prisons in wake of the coronavirus.
content:
A criminal justice reform group backed by celebrities and top business executives is giving 100,000 masks to prisons across the country as those incarcerated are impacted by the coronavirus.
New York's Rikers Island jail will be seeing 50,000 masks from the … [+1604 chars]
